title: Pssst!! Check this OUT!!
posting_body: Rent getting the best of you?
Want to invest in something good for your family?
Want some privacy in your own home and backyard?
Brand new home for sale in the growing community of Patriot Estates!
Monthly payment $1709* ~~ Call Today
show contact info
ext 300
LGI Homes recognizes the importance of homeownership, value, and affordability and we pride ourselves on making that available to you!
Our floor plans include many upgraded features such as energy efficient, stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets, granite and fenced yards.
There are no money down loans available so there is no reason to miss out on this special opportunity!
Homes are available to tour by appointment only.
Call today
show contact info
ext 300
Homeownership never looked so good!
This spacious home offers a covered patio,  gorgeous landscaping, and is fenced for your privacy.
Phone calls are preferred.
If responding to ad by email, please include link to the posting you are inquiring about and your contact information.
*P&I. $300,900, 5.625% Fixed/6.720% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Price and rates are subject to change without notice
